hook: Everyone talks about AI but few ship
insight: Group7 shipped a complete autonomous video factory in 24 hours. Most people spend months planning. We built D-ID integration, tested 9 videos, and posted production content. That's the difference between talking and doing.

hook: Here's our exact AI video stack
insight: D-ID for talking heads, GPT-4 for scripts, ElevenLabs for voice synthesis. Local storage, zero cloud complexity. 10-second renders, production quality. This stack costs pennies per video and scales infinitely.

hook: We built our own instead of subscribing
insight: Most video AI tools charge $50-200/month. We built our own for $5 in API costs. Full control, no vendor lock-in, customizable pipeline. The 24-hour build investment pays for itself in week one.

hook: AI content doesn't have to look robotic
insight: Our videos use real voice models, natural lip-sync, and professional avatars. No text-to-speech monotone. No weird animations. Just clean, engaging content that viewers actually watch and share.

hook: This AI generates 7 videos daily unattended
insight: Wake up to 7 new videos ready to post. No editing, no rendering, no manual work. The system runs overnight, generates scripts with GPT-4, creates talking heads with D-ID, and outputs production files. Truly autonomous.

hook: Most AI tools don't talk to each other
insight: We connected GPT-4, D-ID, ElevenLabs, and Google Drive into one pipeline. Each API call feeds the next automatically. No copy-paste between tools. This is how you actually save time with AI automation.
